description:
As Hirata recovers and the class shows unity, it`s finally Ayanokoji vs. Sakayanagi. The final special exam has begun and the first round is basketball. Class C puts up a good fight, but Sakayanagi plans to mentally shake Sudo so he will fall.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai ni wa Tatta Hitotsu no Kimari Shikanai. Sore wa Ai Suru Mono o Koufuku ni Michibiku Koto Da
Il n`y a qu`une loi en sentiment. C`est de faire le bonheur de ce qu`on aime
There Is Only One Rule in Love: Bring Happiness to Those You Love.
愛にはたったひとつの決まりしかない. それは愛する者を幸福に導くことだ
